Volume 11 of This week in REST is up on the blog - http://wp.me/pMXr1-1q. 
=

Also, as I wrote on the blog, from this week there will be a change in the=
 way links for the blog are collected. Since no one except me was contribut=
ing links to the REST wiki (http://rest.blueoxen.net/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?RESTWe=
ekly) for the last couple of weeks, from now on I'll be collecting links my=
self and if you want a REST-related link included - just e-mail me, tweet o=
r leave a comment on the latest blog post.

Ivan
